69f5cf0c-96bd-465a-8a8b-a26e5a03107b.description: Earners have demonstrated proficiency to onboard, operate, manage and support the most common Metallic™ services for customers transacting on the Metallic™ MSP portal. They have a solid understanding of the Metallic™ MSP solution and working with the Metallic™ Hub to best protect, backup and recover customer data and workloads.
69f5cf0c-96bd-465a-8a8b-a26e5a03107b.name: Metallic Specialist for MSP

badge_template_activities.title: This learning path is made of a series of five courses: 1) Metallic™ Technical Sales Professional 1 - 2) Metallic™ Technical Sales Professional 2 - 3) Metallic™ MSP Portal Overview - 4) Metallic™ Support Training for MSP - 5) Metallic™ Services Support Training for MSPs
Passed all exams of the learning path.

e1a6b37b-5b86-4979-bcd5-2d44d85f1185.description: Commvault's CEO Living Our Values Awards are delivered quarterly to recognize and celebrate outstanding Vaulters who are doing incredible work as they live our values: Connect, Inspire, Care, and Deliver
e1a6b37b-5b86-4979-bcd5-2d44d85f1185.name: Commvault's CEO Living Our Values Award

badge_template_activities.title: Nominated by managers, voted on by executives.

3e170404-bbac-4d8b-a56e-0fd1950ab0de.description: Earners have demonstrated proficiency to manage customer environments including onboarding, operations, management, and support for the comprehensive set of Metallic™ services, spanning SaaS Apps, Hypervisor, DB, AD, and File & Object Level Protection.
3e170404-bbac-4d8b-a56e-0fd1950ab0de.name: Metallic Specialist PLUS for MSP

badge_template_activities.title: This learning path covers the following Metallic™ Services: 1.) MS Dynamics 365 2.) Salesforce 3.) VM: AWS EC2 4.) Kubernetes 5.) Databases: Microsoft SQL Servers, SAP HANA, Oracle and AWS Cloud Databases 6.) File & Object Storage 7.) Active Directory & Azure Active Directory. To complete this learning path candidates must have successfully completed the Metallic™ Specialist for MSP Curriculum and are required to pass the Metallic™ Specialist PLUS exam.
Holds latest Metallic™ Specialist for MSP status and has passed Metallic™ Services Support PLUS exam.

cb47e153-0a7e-47ac-b75c-730989974771.description: The annual Global Women's Leadership Awards allow Commvault to promote the visibility and recognition of successful women leaders who are truly making an impact. They are awarded annually during Women's History Month celebrations, nominated and voted on by Commvault's Women in Technology members.
cb47e153-0a7e-47ac-b75c-730989974771.name: Global Women's Leadership Award

badge_template_activities.title: The annual Global Women's Leadership Awards allow Commvault to promote the visibility and recognition of successful women leaders who are truly making an impact. They are awarded annually during Women's History Month celebrations, nominated and voted on by Commvault's Women in Technology members.

c0957f56-3a43-4fd8-b13f-b75ec6d380a3.description: Our Commvault Global Technical Ambassadors are part of a small exclusive network of highly skilled and experienced data protection and disaster recovery solution architects and consultants. They are industry 'Mavens' that our partners and customers depend on for expert knowledge of Commvault's portfolio of data protection core and SaaS solutions.
c0957f56-3a43-4fd8-b13f-b75ec6d380a3.name: Commvault Global Technical Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Global Technical Ambassador designation is earned via layer of deep industry experience and Commvault and Metallic certification. Ambassadors are nominated and chosen to join this global program, and display a passion for knowledge sharing and helping our customers and partners deal with removing complexity from their data protection challenges.
